titleStmt.title: The true reporte of the forme and shape of a monstrous childe, borne at Muche Horkesleye a village three myles from Colchester, in the countye of Essex, the .xxi. daye of Apryll in this yeare. 1562.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete nere to S. Dunstons church by Thomas Marshe,

notesStmt.note: Woodcut with letterpress verse and prose--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
